WorkItem.Description:
Rawr mage 2.0 seems broken, it gives inconsistent results, for yellow sockets it sometimes chooses 10 crit and 10 haste and sometimes 5 haste 6 power with no consideration to socket bonus (damage).
 
For instance it socketed Grand Magisters Staff of Torrents with 2 10 crit rating and one 5 haste 6 power and another item with 10 haste gems.
 
On the same note it socketed Sunfire Handwraps with 10 crit and 5 haste 6 spellpower which obviously ignores 4 spellpower socket bonus.
 
I was using 11/50/0 spec.
